blogPost.excerpt: Create and share internal company podcasts to keep employees in tune with what’s important. For example: easily record a weekly update and send it in a push notification, so your team can listen just like their favorite podcasts.
blogPost.body: Create and share internal company podcasts to keep employees in tune with what’s important. For example: easily record a weekly update and send it in a push notification, so your team can listen just like their favorite podcasts.
blogPost.title: Spokn - Easy internal podcasts for your team
blogPost.author: Gustaf Alströmer

localize.description: 创建和分享公司内部播客，让员工了解重要的事情。例如：轻松录制每周更新的内容，并以推送通知的方式发送，这样你的团队就可以像他们喜欢的播客一样收听。
localize.tagline: 为您的团队提供轻松的内部播客

localize.description: 創建和分享公司內部播客，讓員工瞭解重要的事情。例如：輕鬆錄製每週更新的內容，並以推送通知的方式發送，這樣你的團隊就可以像他們喜歡的播客一樣收聽。
localize.tagline: 爲您的團隊提供輕鬆的內部播客

previous.excerpt: Make your company Apple-friendly with LiveChat integrated with Apple Business Chat. Thanks to it, customers can contact you through Messages chat button integrated in multiple iOS apps like Apple Maps, Siri and more.
previous.title: Apple Business Chat for LiveChat - Offer great customer experience on Apple devices

localize.description: 通过与 Apple Business Chat 集成的 LiveChat，让你的公司对苹果友好。有了它，客户可以通过集成在苹果地图、Siri等多个iOS应用中的信息聊天按钮与你联系。
localize.tagline: 在苹果设备上提供良好的客户体验

localize.description: 通過與 Apple Business Chat 集成的 LiveChat，讓你的公司對蘋果友好。有了它，客戶可以通過集成在蘋果地圖、Siri等多個iOS應用中的信息聊天按鈕與你聯繫。
localize.tagline: 在蘋果設備上提供良好的客戶體驗

next.excerpt: DuoQi is a 65W Gallium Nitride (GaN) charger which integrates a foldable 15W double-sided wireless charging pad, a USB-A 3.0 and a Type-C PD charging port.
next.title: DuoQi - The 1st 65W GaN Charger w/ Wireless Charging Pad

localize.description: DuoQi是一款65W氮化镓(GaN)充电器，它集成了一个可折叠的15W双面无线充电板、一个USB-A 3.0和一个Type-C PD充电口。
localize.tagline: 第1个65W GaN无线充电板充电器

localize.description: DuoQi是一款65W氮化鎵(GaN)充電器，它集成了一個可摺疊的15W雙面無線充電板、一個USB-A 3.0和一個Type-C PD充電口。
localize.tagline: 第1個65W GaN無線充電板充電器
